title: Forensic
writer: Anas Khan, Akhil Paul, P. Shijith
short_cast: Tovino Thomas, Mamtha Mohandas, Renji Panicker, Saiju Kurup, Reba Monica John, Pratap Pothen, Giju John, Sreekanth Murali
cast: Tovino Thomas, Mamtha Mohandas, Renji Panicker, Saiju Kurup, Reba Monica John, Pratap Pothen, Giju John, Sreekanth Murali
genre: Mysteries, Malayalam-Language Movies, Crime Movies, Thriller Movies

desc: A pair of officers with history navigates clues from the past, false leads and a ticking clock to nab an elusive serial killer who targets young girls.
